code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{Stack,Image,Text,Icon,Button}from"@chakra-ui/react";import{RepeatClockIcon}from"@chakra-ui/icons";import ModalCoins from"./ModalCoins";import{useUser}from"../hooks/useUser";import{usePoints}from"../hooks/usePoints";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Navbar=function Navbar(){var _useUser=useUser(),name=_useUser.name;var _usePoints=usePoints(),points=_usePoints.points,addPoints=_usePoints.addPoints,loading=_usePoints.loading;var handleAddCoins=function handleAddCoins(point){addPoints(point);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{as:"nav",isInline:true,alignItems:"center",height:"80px",justifyContent:"space-between",bg:"white",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/home",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{src:"../assets/logo.svg",ml:4,loading:"lazy"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{isInline:true,align:"center",justify:"center",mr:4,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontSize:"xl",color:"#616161",letterSpacing:"-0.15px",lineHeight:"48px",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"link",as:Link,to:"/redeems",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{as:RepeatClockIcon,color:"secondary",height:10,width:10})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ModalCoins,{handleAddCoins:handleAddCoins,loading:loading,userPoints:points})]})]});};export default Navbar;
